page.title: 10LADY ZIA WERNHER SCHOOL
page.content: The youngets pupil at this school is two three months, the eldest is eleven years, but they are no ordinary pupils. They all have something in common, they are all physically and mentally handicapped. Both boys and girls are admitted. They have special bikes and do sport, but it is a bit different from our sport. Thbikes cost around Â£250 each. The school was founded in 1964, and it is not private. There are 54 pupils at Lady Zia Wernher. All the pupils which have difficulty speaking use a special language using symbols. Two weeks ago the pupils got back from a Y.C.A. holiday in Portsmouth where they went fishing, canoeing and lots of other activities.
